text:
is there a way to preview a drag-n-drop email in different email clients, ie: how will it look in outlook?
been looking around in the settings / actions of one and haven't found anything. Could be related to my client only being on the `marketing hub starter` level.
:disappointed: yeah, this is sad to hear. It will be solved when as we merge the templating tech together again
At the moment it's not possible, only bg colours on rows/sections and the email itself are possible, it's on our radar though :+1:
All set :+1: was on vacation until today, apologies

Unfortunately this is a limitation of Marketing Hub Starter at the moment. Client testing is only available in Marketing Hub Professional and Enterprise. There's a possibility that that will change in the future, we're looking into it, but for the moment it's not available in Starter
Just got back to everyone here, apologies for the delay, I was on vacation last week :snowboarder: let me know if I've missed anyone's question :slightly_smiling_face:
